short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your Amazon FBA profit calculator into an advanced sourcing co-pilot!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly get analysis from custom algorithms and best-in-class data directly on Amazon product pages that show you exactly what $1,000,000 sellers look at. Identify within seconds whether a product is a BUY or BYE!

Identify helps you answer the following questions when you’re sourcing:
- Am I allowed to sell this product?
- How often does this product sell per month?
- How much money can I make per sale?
- What’s the ROI on my investment into this product?
- Can I compete on this listing versus the other sellers?
- Are there other similar products that might be more profitable?
- Are there any red flags I should watch out for?
- Are there any green flags I should be excited about?

With the ability to customize to your own sourcing guidelines, our data analytics tool adjusts and will visually display whether or not a product should be purchased via a green or red background behind fields such as:
- The BSR (best seller rank)
- The # of monthly sales
- The dollar profit per unit
- The % ROI per unit

We differentiate ourselves with:
✓ A modern, intuitive UI
✓ Redesigned workflow within the extension to increase efficiency
✓ Proprietary, automatic analysis from the minds of $1,000,000+ sellers
✓ A variations tab to instantly identify the best selling ASIN on a listing
✓ Accurate, per ASIN monthly sold count pulled directly from Amazon

Identify is currently available in the USA.

Jump into our 7-day free trial now and immediately make the time you invest in sourcing more profitable!
